wikipedia_page.main: John Patrick Lyon MBE (born 9 March 1962) is a retired boxer from Great Britain.

link_mentions.page: Boxing at the 1984 Summer Olympics – Light flyweight
Boxing at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Flyweight

response: Ramazan Gül (born 14 February 1967) is a Turkish boxer. He competed in the men's flyweight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. At the 1988 Summer Olympics, he defeated John Lyon of Great Britain, before losing to Gamal El-Din El-Koumy of Egypt.
